scripts.start: rm -r -f app/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development MEASURE=false ImagesResizer=true webpack-dev-server --config configs/webpack.config.js --mode development --open
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MEASURE=false ImagesResizer=true webpack --config configs/webpack.config.js --mode development
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MEASURE=true ImagesResizer=true webpack --config configs/webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.analyze: mkdirp app/log && cross-env NODE_ENV=production MEASURE=false ImagesResizer=false webpack --config configs/webpack.config.js --mode production --json > app/log/stats.json && webpack-bundle-analyzer app/log/stats.json
scripts.ext: code --install-extension eamodio.gitlens && code --install-extension ms-vscode.powershell && code --install-extension teabyii.ayu && code --install-extension PKief.material-icon-theme && code --install-extension pranaygp.vscode-css-peek && code --install-extension ecmel.vscode-html-css && code ----install-extension rafikis75.vscode-sassdoc && code --install-extension ionutvmi.path-autocomplete && code --install-extension formulahendry.auto-complete-tag && code --install-extension wmaurer.change-case && code --install-extension CoenraadS.bracket-pair-colorizer && code --install-extension streetsidesoftware.code-spell-checker && code --install-extension wayou.vscode-todo-highlight && code --install-extension wallabyjs.quokka-vscode && code --install-extension dbaeumer.vscode-eslint && code --install-extension esbenp.prettier-vscode && code --install-extension kisstkondoros.vscode-gutter-preview && code --install-extension jumpinjackie.vscode-map-preview && code --install-extension jock.svg && code --install-extension DavidAnson.vscode-markdownlint && code --install-extension earshinov.sort-lines-by-selection && code --install-extension ritwickdey.LiveServer && code --install-extension wix.vscode-import-cost && code --install-extension xabikos.JavaScriptSnippets && code --install-extension gogocrow.webpack-snippets
